messages.body: $TSLA is in play. Do you want to be right or make money?
$TSLA I would be concerned about spending and debt if they didn‚Äôt have demand..but their demand will be what sets them apart in the EV space
$TSLA needs the freedom to grow and expand as rapidly as possible in the market that they are in. They are competing against cash flow kings

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla‚Äôs are ready for Formula 1, Tesla car-racing series gets go-ahead from Formula 1 overseer, promoter says http://www.siliconbeat.com/2018/02/01/tesla-car-racing-series-gets-go-ahead-from-formula-1-overseer/?yptr=yahoo

links.title: Tesla car-racing series gets go-ahead from Formula 1 overseer, promoter says
links.description: The prospect of an all-Tesla auto-racing series just got a lot closer to reality with approval by the group that oversees Formula 1 racing, according to a race promoter. And as an added bonus, the events will reportedly feature competitive "drifting," in which cars slide at high speed through turns.
